subject: HSBC LONDON UK BANK PLC.
body:
HSBC LONDON UK BANK PLC.
Address: 28 Borough High St,
London SE1 1YB, United Kingdom
Phone: +44 345 740 4404
Hello.?
I am Dr Andrew Makinson. The Managing Director of HSBC bank of London
UK and i am contacting you regarding to the  insertion we received
from the World Bank  to release your funds sum 10.5 Million 
United
State Dollars
 to you through ATM Visa Card  immediately
So 
you are advice to resend your information below to  receive your
ATM Visa Card from our agent to your doorstep  immediately
FULL NAMES: _______________
CITY: ________________
STATE: ______________
ZIP: __________
COUNTRY_______________
AGE: _____
TELEPHONE NUMBER: _________
Waiting for your urgent reply.
We bank in your response.
Yours in service,
Regards,
BEST REGARDS,
Managing Director/HSBC UK
Dr Andrew Makinson

subject: Re: HSBC LONDON UK BANK PLC.
body:
Hello Dr. Andrew Makinson,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your time and effort in contacting me regarding the release of my funds. However, I have a few questions before proceeding further.

1. Can you please provide more details about the World Bank's involvement in this matter? How did they come to know about my funds?

2. Could you explain how the ATM Visa Card works? Is it a secure method of receiving funds?

3. What are the fees or charges associated with receiving the ATM Visa Card? Are there any hidden costs that I should be aware of?

4. Can you provide some information about your agent who will be delivering the card to my doorstep? How can I verify their authenticity?

I look forward to your response and clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
Sara
